title: Bug 5722Selecting font crashes eclipse with a javacore
description: Eclipse V2.0 Build 20011107OS: RedHat Linux 7.1JDK version:/opt/IBMJava213/bin/ ./java versionjava version "1.3.0"Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3.0)Classic VM (build 1.3.0, J2RE 1.3.0 IBM build cx13020010925 (JIT enabled: jitc))To Reproduce:Startup eclipse (i had a fresh zip with no workspace and i specified no options)Open WindowPreferencesWorkBenchFontSelect Text font ( my inital value here was "adobecourierregular12" )Click Change to bring up font dialogchange the font size to 14. And click ok to dismiss the font dialogClick Apply on preferences page. Click OK on preferences Page.
